net.cloud.server.event.command

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommand, CmdScriptCommand, CreateAccountCommand, EchoCommand, LoadActionCommand, NoParameterCommand, ShutdownCommand, TestCommand, ToggleStatTrackingCommand

    public interface Command
    A Command, which is meant to perform some action dynamically. It can be provided parameters. A command is submitted and created through the CommandHandler, from a string containing information about the command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String doCommand()
      Take the action of the command.
      Command newPrototypedInstance()
      Create a new instance of a command, which will be the same type as the concrete class implementing this interface.
      void parseArguments(String argumentLine)
      Take a line of text which is used to construct parameters that are handed to the command

    • Method Detail

      • newPrototypedInstance

        Command newPrototypedInstance()
        Create a new instance of a command, which will be the same type as the concrete class implementing this interface. This is so a prototype can be used.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a concrete command type

      • parseArguments

        void parseArguments(String argumentLine)
             throws CommandException
        Take a line of text which is used to construct parameters that are handed to the command
        Parameters:
        argumentLine - The parameters this command is given
        Throws:
        CommandException - If the parameters cannot be parsed

      • doCommand

        String doCommand()
        Take the action of the command. The result is returned as a user friendly string
        Returns:
        A user-friendly result message
